name: Lovers In the Crowd
description:
An entry for Brackeys Game Jam, with the theme of "Love is blind"

A local multiplayer game. Needs two controllers to play

Controls:

Each player controls two character. Use the left and right joysticks to move and the left and right triggers to Embrace with the respective character. The Joystick and Triggers also control the menus.

Play as two lost lovers in a sea of identical faces. Reunite the lost lovers and land a embrace one another to win the game. But watch out missed place love can be a dangers thing. Embrace the other Player's character will send them back to the start. Try to blend in with the crowd while trying not to loose your self and reunite your lost lovers before the other Player can
